short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline the GitHub pull request (PR) approval process with enhanced features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool aims to enhance the pull request (PR) review experience on GitHub. Its core functionality revolves around filtering out unnecessary files, thereby expediting the review process. Additionally, it offers the ability to resize the GitHub sidebar, ensuring that filenames are fully visible for improved navigation and comprehension during the review process.
